trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs> class contains information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs> class provides access to the display mode that was applied to the Web Parts control before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs>类提供对已应用于在之前的 Web 部件控件的显示模式访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The former display mode is accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs.OldDisplayMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过访问以前的显示模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs.OldDisplayMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> applied to the Web Parts control before the display mode is changed.
trans-unit.target: 在显示模式更改之前应用于 Web 部件控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the former display mode for a Web Part control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 Web 部件控件原先的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> applied to a Web Parts control before the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> 事件之前应用于 Web 部件控件的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged" />。
